Key Match Events: Morocco scored a goal after Zambia goalkeeper Lawrence Mulenga made a mistake
Zambia survived several scares before falling behind
Pre-Game Insights: Morocco was already qualified for the last 16
Zambia needed a draw to scrape through at the expense of Ivory Coast
Post-Match Reflections: Ivory Coast qualified for the last 16 due to this result
Morocco coach Walid Regragui was banned for two matches after a post-match incident
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the third meeting between Morocco and Zambia
Morocco were playing their 73rd match in the tournament
Others: The stadium was named after deceased Ivorian football legend Laurent Pokou
